title: Ok that was neat and all
body:
But it's been a day, can you turn GP back on?

I doubt I'm the only person who was wanting to get more familiar with the rework., and disabling him for a day seems like plenty.  I mean you have him turned off even in ranked, for supposedly no gameplay reason whatsoever.  What if I was a GP main?  Those guys exist, why screw them over so hard just for some random storyline effect that we all know isn't permanent?

replies.body: Yeah I'd like gp back now. Legit GP main here and I just want my favorite champion back already.
